dict.acceptation: 每日的，日常的；一日的；每日一次的；每个工作日的；
日报；（不寄宿的）仆人，白天做家务的女佣；
每日；逐日；每周日；日复一日地；

sent.orig: Responsible for communications with financial institutions, daily cash processing and daily and monthly cash bank reconciliations.
sent.trans: 负责与各财务机构的沟通，了解现金日流动状况，确认与银行往来的现金日对账单和月对账单。

sent.orig: Afterward the daily grind begins. A serious trader reviews weekly and daily charts each day.
sent.trans: 痛苦的还在后面，认真的交易者还要每天分析周线图和日线图。

sent.orig: Daily accounting booking including revenue, cost and SG&A, preparing daily transaction voucher.
sent.trans: 日常会计帐务处理，包括收入、成本、费用的核算和编制凭证。

sent.orig: China daily and People Daily has published article about the Martial Art Talent– Zhong Hai Ming.
sent.trans: 人民日报、国日报曾刊登“武秀才----钟海明”的文章，予以介绍。

sent.orig: Methods: According to the defined daily dose(DDD)recommended by WHO,the daily drug cost and DDDs were analyzed.
sent.trans: 方法：根据WHO推荐的限定日剂量，以用药频度(DDDs)、日用金额等为指标统计、分析我院催眠药物的应用情况。
